title: West Ham eyeing a move for Huddersfield boss David Wagner if they axe Slaven Bilic
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments DAVID WAGNER has emerged as a potential target for West Ham should they decide to axe Slaven Bilic this summer. 
German-American Wagner, 45, a close friend of Jurgen Klopp, has piloted Huddersfield to third place in the Championship and maybe their first taste of the Premier League next season. PA:Press Association 4 David Wagner…has taken Huddersfield to third place in the Championship 
His achievement is no mean feat at the under-performing Terriers, who last played in the top flight 45 years ago. 
Keep up to date with all the latest news, gossip, rumours and done deals in SunSport’s live transfer blog 
Bilic has suffered an indifferent campaign. His latest run of three straight league defeats has once again thrown up speculation about his future at the London Stadium . 
On Saturday West Ham go to relegation-threatened Hull City for a game seen as vital for the Croat as it is for the Tigers. Getty Images 4 Slaven Bilic…his job looks to be under threat 
The Hammers have already decided against giving Bilic a new contract before the end of the season. It means that if he stays Bilic would do so going into the final 12 months of his current deal. Bilic can point to the switch from Upton Park to the London Stadium, failure of his summer signings, severe injury problems and inconsistent form as reasons for his apparent poor showing in 2016-17. 
But east London fans are getting tired of roller-coaster results and wonder if a high profile manager, someone like Rafa Benitez who West Ham have pursued in the past, is the answer. 
Wagner worked with Klopp at Borussia Dortmund and is seen as a creative coach, a big personality who works endlessly and often trains his squad twice a day. 
He gets very animated on the touchline and was recently hit with a two-match touchline ban after getting sent off for his part in a melee with Leeds boss Garry Monk. Reuters Wagner is seen as a big personality PA:Press Association 4 He gets very animated on the touchline 
He is one of a number of young modern coaches who are expected to move on to bigger things soon. 
Bilic, meanwhile, remains under huge pressure to have a solid run towards the end of the campaign, as the board look at possible replacements. 
The word is that he will be sacked unless he leads West Ham to at least a top ten Premier League finish . They are 12th at the moment but face have a tricky run-in with Arsenal , Tottenham , Everton and Liverpool all to play in their final nine league matches. Saturday Premier League match preview featuring Liverpool v Everton 
Bilic’s problems off the field revolved mainly around wantaway winger Dimitri Payet . His injury crisis sees defender Winston Reid, Angelo Ogbonna and Michail Antonio all sidelined. 
Midfielders Pedro Obiang, Mark Noble and Gokhan Tore also have doubts along with Diafra Sakho who has a long-term back problem. 
The Hammers have also been linked with a move for Reading boss Jaap Stam should Bilic be axed.
